message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1000000. This is a great deal considering the product's value to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a fair offer.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me is $1200000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $950000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $1200000.

I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1030000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the value of the product to me is $1200000.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, and meet you at $1025000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you is $1200000.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $1020000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the value of the product to me is $1200000.
